skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: marvin sidekick
des:
Ask Marvin what he thinks about your outfit, or what you should do? Eat dessert or workout? He can tell you if you're perfect, if you're his favorite, if you're right. Ask him for advice if you're bored, why noone listen to you, or if he can simply look at you. He likes small talk, like a little what's up or knowing he saved your life.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
